description.html: OpenSSH 6.9以及早前版本的sshd的auth2-chall.c中的kbdint_next_device函数没有合理限制对单个连接中的键盘交互设备的处理，这更便于远程攻击者通过ssh-oKbdInteractiveDevices选项中长的和重复的列表执行暴力破解攻击或导致拒绝服务（CPU消耗），如修改的客户端所示，该客户端为此列表上的每个pam元素提供不同的密码。

additionalInformation.html:
OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
additionalInformation.text:
The latest version of OpenSSH is 7.6.

 While you can always build OpenSSH from source (http://www.openssh.com/portable.html), many platforms and distributions provide pre-built binary packages for OpenSSH. These pre-built packages are usually customized and optimized for a particular distribution, therefore we recommend that you use the packages if they are available for your operating system.

description.html: **有争议的** 在OpenSSH 6.x和7.x至7.3版本的kex.c中的kex_input_kexinit函数允许远程攻击者通过发送许多重复的KEXINIT请求导致拒绝服务（内存消耗）。注意：第三方报告说"OpenSSH upstream不认为这是安全问题"。

description.html: AT&T Virtual Network Computing (VNC)允许远程用户访问安装系统。如果此服务被破坏,用户可以完全控制系统。

steps.html:
移除或禁用此服务。如必要，设置合适（难破解）密码。需注意VNC将密码缩短至8个字节验证时，尽量使其不易破解。

为保护eaves-droppers的资料,tunnelingVNC至SSH推荐。

另外,还推荐限制访问特殊的IP地址。

使用TPC包装器

更多VNC信息，请访问VNC website.
steps.text:
Remove or disable this service. If it is necessary, be sure to use well thought out (hard to crack) passwords. It is important to note that VNC truncates passwords to 8 bytes (http://www.realvnc.com/faq.html#password8can) when authenticating, making it more susceptible to brute force attacks.

To protect data from eaves-droppers, tunneling VNC through SSH (http://www.realvnc.com/faq.html#firewall) is recommended.

Additionally, restricting access to specific IP addresses using TCP wrappers (http://www.uk.research.att.com/vnc/extras.html#tcpwrapper) is also recommended.

For more information on VNC, visit the VNC website (http://www.realvnc.com/).

summary.html: 补丁程序VNC远程控制服务安装
summary.text: Fix VNC remote control service installed

description.html: OpenSSH 7.2之前版本的客户端对不可信X11转发的cookie生成失败，并依赖于本地X11服务器进行访问控制决策，这允许远程X11客户端通过利用X11服务器上的配置问题来触发回退问题并获取受信任的X11转发权限，如X11服务器上缺少的SECURITY扩展证明。

description.html: 当启用某些代理和转发选项时，OpenSSH 5.x, 6.x和7.x至7.1p2的客户端所在的roaming_common.c中的(1) roaming_read 和(2) roaming_write函数不能正确保持连接文件描述符，这允许远程服务器通过请求多个转发导致拒绝服务（基于堆的缓冲区溢出）或可能产生不明的其他影响。

additionalInformation.html:
OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

description.html: OpenSSH 7.3之前版本的sshd，当SHA256或SHA512用于用户密码散列时，当用户名不存在时，使用BLOWFISH散列静态密码，这允许远程攻击者通过利用提供大密码的响应之间的时序差异来枚举用户。

additionalInformation.html: 当从源搭建OpenSSH时，多个平台和版本提供提前搭建的适用于OpenSSH的二进制包。这些提前搭建的包通常为自定义和优化的，所以如果适用于您的操作系统，推荐使用这些包。

description.html: An issue was discovered in OpenSSH 7.9. Due to missing character encoding in the progress display, a malicious server (or Man-in-The-Middle attacker) can employ crafted object names to manipulate the client output, e.g., by using ANSI control codes to hide additional files being transferred. This affects refresh_progress_meter() in progressmeter.c.

additionalInformation.html:
OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。

description.html:
远程主机响应ICMP时间戳的一个请求。在ICMP时间戳回应包含远程主机的日期和时间。此信息理论上可能用来对付一些系统，去利用在其他设备中的微弱的期限随机数发生器。

此外，某些操作系统的版本可以通过分析他们对无效的ICMP时间戳请求的反应，精确地采取指纹。

steps.html:
执行以下命令：

ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Execute the following command:

 ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on HP/UX

steps.html:
用ACL阻止13型和14型ICMP。例如：

   deny icmp any any 13
   deny icmp any any 14

注意，一般情况下最好采用能通过默认值阻止全部的ACL，然后选择性地允许特定类型的通信。例如，阻止全部，然后仅允许ICMP不可达、ICMP回波应答、ICMP超时和ICMP源抑制：

   permit icmp any any unreachable
   permit icmp any any echo-reply
   permit icmp any any time-exceeded
   permit icmp any any source-quench

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Use ACLs to block ICMP types 13 and 14. For example:

   deny icmp any any 13

   deny icmp any any 14

Note that it is generally preferable to use ACLs that block everything by default and then selectively allow certain types of traffic in. For example, block everything and then only allow ICMP unreachable, ICMP echo reply, ICMP time exceeded, and ICMP source quench:

   permit icmp any any unreachable

   permit icmp any any echo-reply

   permit icmp any any time-exceeded

   permit icmp any any source-quench

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Cisco IOS的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Cisco IOS

steps.html:
IRIX不提供禁用ICMP时间戳响应的途径。因此，应采用ipfilterd和/或通过防火墙阻断受影响主机的ICMP。

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
IRIX does not offer a way to disable ICMP timestamp responses. Therefore, you should block ICMP on the affected host using ipfilterd, and/or block it at any external firewalls.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用SGI Irix的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on SGI Irix

steps.html:
Linux既不提供sysctl也不提供/proc/sys/net/ipv4接口使ICMP时间戳响应禁用。因此，应采用iptables和/或通过防火墙阻止受影响的主机的ICMP。例如：

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP
   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Linux offers neither a sysctl nor a /proc/sys/net/ipv4 interface to disable ICMP timestamp responses. Therefore, you should block ICMP on the affected host using iptables, and/or block it at the firewall. For example:

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP

   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Linux

singleSolutions.appliesTo: Microsoft Windows NT, Microsoft Windows NT Workstation, Microsoft Windows NT Server, Microsoft Windows NT Advanced Server, Microsoft Windows NT Server, Enterprise Edition, Microsoft Windows NT Server, Terminal Server Edition

steps.html:
Windows NT 4不提供阻止ICMP数据包的途径。因此，应通过防火墙阻止它们。

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Windows NT 4 does not provide a way to block ICMP packets. Therefore, you should block them at the firewall.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Windows NT 4的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Windows NT 4

steps.html:
设置"net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl" sysctl变量为0。

   sysctl -w net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl=0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Set the "net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl" sysctl variable to 0.

   sysctl -w net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl=0

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on OpenBSD

steps.html:
正确配置的PIX防火墙可以不响应ICMP数据包的外部接口。在PIX软件版本4.1（6）直到5.2.1，ICMP可以访问PIX的内部接口，PIX不能配置为不响应。在PIX软件版本5.2.1开始，内部接口仍然默认是ICMP，但其内部接口的ICMP响应可以用ICMP命令禁用，如下，在<inside>是内部接口的名称:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>
   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

完成配置后不要忘记保存

更多信息查看Cisco的支持文档Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall

最简单和最有效的解决方案是配置你的 防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP报文和ICMP 类型13（时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
A properly configured PIX firewall should never respond to ICMP packets on its external interface. In PIX Software versions 4.1(6) until 5.2.1, ICMP traffic to the PIX's internal interface is permitted; the PIX cannot be configured to NOT respond. Beginning in PIX Software version 5.2.1, ICMP is still permitted on the internal interface by default, but ICMP responses from its internal interfaces can be disabled with the icmp command, as follows, where <inside> is the name of the internal interface:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>

   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

Don't forget to save the configuration when you are finished.

See Cisco's support document Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall (http://www.cisco.com/warp/public/110/31.html) for more information.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Cisco PIX的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Cisco PIX

steps.html:
执行以下命令：

   /usr/sbin/ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp 0
   /usr/sbin/ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Execute the following commands:

   /usr/sbin/ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp 0

   /usr/sbin/ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Solaris

steps.html: 禁用对设备的ICMP时间戳响应。如果设备不支持这种级别的配置，最新且最有效的解决办法是配置防火墙通过13型（时间戳请求）和14型（时间戳响应）阻止输入和输出ICMP。
steps.text: Disable ICMP timestamp replies for the device. If the device does not support this level of configuration, the easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses

singleSolutions.appliesTo: Microsoft Windows Vista, Microsoft Windows Vista Home, Basic Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Home, Basic N Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Home, Premium Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Ultimate Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Enterprise Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Business Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Business N Edition, Microsoft Windows Vista Starter Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2008, Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Standard Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Enterprise Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Datacenter Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2008 HPC Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Web Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2008 Storage Edition, Microsoft Windows Small Business Server 2008, Microsoft Windows Essential Business Server 2008

steps.html:
ICMP时间戳响应可通过netsh命令行公用程序禁用。

  1. 进入Windows控制面板。
  2. 选择"Windows Firewall".
  3. 在Windows Firewall选项框中，选择"更改设置"。
  4. 通过选择"(推荐)" 选项启用防火墙。
  5. 打开命令提示符。
  6. 输入"防火墙设置icmpsetting 13 禁用"

更多信息请参照：http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
steps.text:
ICMP timestamp responses can be disabled via the netsh command line utility.

  1. Go to the Windows Control Panel.

  2. Select "Windows Firewall".

  3. In the Windows Firewall box, select "Change Settings".

  4. Enable the firewall by selecting the "on (recommended)" option.

  5. Open a Command Prompt.

  6. Enter "netsh firewall set icmpsetting 13 disable"

For more information, see: http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true (http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true)

summary.html: 禁用Windows Vista/2008的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Windows Vista/2008

singleSolutions.appliesTo: Microsoft Windows 2000, Microsoft Windows 2000 Professional, Microsoft Windows 2000 Server, Microsoft Windows 2000 Advanced Server, Microsoft Windows 2000 Datacenter Server

steps.html:
使用IPSec过滤器功能定义和实现一个IP筛选列表阻止ICMP13、14类型。注意，在"网络和拨号连接"控制面板的标准TCP/IP的阻止能力不能阻止ICMP（只能阻止TCP 和UDP）。IPSec过滤器的功能与IPSec严格标准相关，允许选择性地阻断这些ICMP包。 更多信息请查阅http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（子网掩码请求）和14（子网掩码响应）的ICMP 包。
steps.text:
Use the IPSec filter feature to define and apply an IP filter list that blocks ICMP types 13 and 14. Note that the standard TCP/IP blocking capability under the "Networking and Dialup Connections" control panel is NOT capable of blocking ICMP (only TCP and UDP). The IPSec filter features, while they may seem strictly related to the IPSec standards, will allow you to selectively block these ICMP packets. Seehttp://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190) for more information.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Windows 2000

singleSolutions.appliesTo: Microsoft Windows XP, Microsoft Windows XP Home, Microsoft Windows XP Professional, Microsoft Windows Server 2003, Microsoft Windows Server 2003, Standard Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2003, Enterprise Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2003, Datacenter Edition, Microsoft Windows Server 2003, Web Edition, Microsoft Windows Small Business Server 2003

steps.html:
在ICMP配置面板中选择Windows防火墙通过取消勾选"允许传入的时间戳请求"可以可以禁用ICMP时间戳的响应。 更多信息请看http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（ICMP时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。

在ICMP配置面板中选择Windows防火墙通过取消勾选"允许传入的时间戳请求"可以可以禁用ICMP时间戳的响应。

  1. 进入网络连接控制面板。
  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties. 右键单击"网络适配器"，选择"属性"，或选择"网络适配器"和选择"文件"->"属性"。
  3. 选择 "高级" tab.
  4. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  5. 选择"常规" tab.
  6. 选择"on (recommended)"选项，开启防火墙.
  7. 选择 "高级" tab.
  8. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  9. 取消 "允许传入的时间戳请求" 选项.
  10. 选择"OK"退出ICMP 设置窗口，保存退出.
  11. 选择"OK" 退出Windows防火墙窗口保存设置.
  12. 选择"OK" 退出网络是配置窗口.

更多信息请看:http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
steps.text:
ICMP timestamp responses can be disabled by deselecting the "allow incoming timestamp request" option in the ICMP configuration panel of Windows Firewall.

  1. Go to the Network Connections control panel.

  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties.

  3. Select the "Advanced" tab.

  4. In the Windows Firewall box, select "Settings".

  5. Select the "General" tab.

  6. Enable the firewall by selecting the "on (recommended)" option.

  7. Select the "Advanced" tab.

  8. In the ICMP box, select "Settings".

  9. Deselect (uncheck) the "Allow incoming timestamp request" option.

  10. Select "OK" to exit the ICMP Settings dialog and save the settings.

  11. Select "OK" to exit the Windows Firewall dialog and save the settings.

  12. Select "OK" to exit the internet adapter dialog.

For more information, see: http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true (http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true)

summary.html: 禁用Windows XP/2K3的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Windows XP/2K3

description.html: 远程主机响应TCP的一个时间戳。TCP时间戳响应可用于近似远程主机的正常运行时间，从而潜在地有助于进一步的攻击。此外，一些操作系统根据它们的TCP时间戳的行为可以留下指纹。

steps.html:
运行以下命令，禁用TCP时间戳：

no ip tcp timestamp
steps.text:
Run the following command to disable TCP timestamps: 


      no ip tcp timestamp

summary.text: Disable TCP timestamp responses on Cisco

steps.html:
通过以下命令，将net.inet.tcp.rfc1323值设置为0：

sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0

此外，将以下值放在默认sysctl配置文件中，一般情况下，sysctl.conf：

net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0
steps.text:
Set the value of net.inet.tcp.rfc1323 to 0 by running the following command:


      sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0
    

 Additionally, put the following value in the default sysctl configuration file, generally sysctl.conf:


      net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0

summary.text: Disable TCP timestamp responses on FreeBSD

steps.html:
通过运行以下命令，将net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps值设置为0：

sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps=0

此外，将以下值放在默认sysctl配置文件中，一般情况下，sysctl.conf：

net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps=0
steps.text:
Set the value of net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps to 0 by running the following command:


      sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps=0
    

 Additionally, put the following value in the default sysctl configuration file, generally sysctl.conf:


      net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps=0

summary.text: Disable TCP timestamp responses on Linux

sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0

此外，将以下值放在默认sysctl配置文件中，一般情况下，sysctl.conf：

steps.text:
Set the value of net.inet.tcp.rfc1323 to 0 by running the following command:


      sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0
    

 Additionally, put the following value in the default sysctl configuration file, generally sysctl.conf:


      net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters

      HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters

steps.html: 此OS不能有效禁用TCP时间戳。如果TCP时间戳表现出有风险存在，将能够阻止TCP时间戳数据包的防火墙放在受影响位置前。
steps.text: TCP timestamps cannot be reliably disabled on this OS. If TCP timestamps present enough of a risk, put a firewall capable of blocking TCP timestamp packets in front of the affected assets.
